unnormalised: Bore, lokanno, zalear ami Indian Airways vixim uloiya, khas korun Bharotant *bhitor* udd’ddi korop. Mhaka just Guwahati thaun Mumbai-k vochunk poddlem, Delhi-nt thambun. Khorench sangtaa, gharchea gharchem udaanticho anubhav ek mix zal’le, nahi mhunn?
normalised: Okay mitraanno, tor aami Indian Airways vishim, khas korun Bharotant bhonvddi kortanaa, ulo maruyaa. Mhaka Guwahati than Mumbai-k, Delhi-chea sttopover-anvantar, bhonvddi korun ailyaa uprant. Satya sangtaa, gharaantlea bhonvddi-cho anubhav meesrit, naavho?

unnormalised: Poilem, flights book korop. Hanv sodanch MakeMyTrip ani Yatra.com sarkhea anek website-ank check kortam. Dor ek airline “sale” va “discount” offer kortat mhonn dista, punn tumi fine print vachunk zai, sorkhem nahi? Hanv IndiGo flight 6E203 book kelem, punn SpiceJet gheunchea utarponaar asleam kiteak tea cheaper base fare asle. Bori deal mellounk tumka nitya zuzunk podta.
normalised: Poileantu, fllait book korop. Hanv sadhyaa MakeMyTrip aani Yatra.com sarkheo anek saitting sodtaa. Dor fllait-anche saavkaar "sale" vo "discount" ditaat, punn tumkam baraiki-nni vaachpak zai, naavho? Hanv IndiGo fllait six E don shambe teen book kelo, punn SpiceJet hanv thoddo chuklolo karan tem komi bhadde-chem zaataalem. Uttam deal sodpachi ek satatachi zhuzaachi vat.

unnormalised: Ani magnak airportancho anubhav. Security line sodanch lamb asta, khas korun peak season jevn Diwali va summer vacations. Hanv ek power bank gheun asleam (20000mAh), ani maka thambailo - distaa, tanka tumchea hatacho lugachea bhitor asunk zai. Sodanch kitem-tor kitem! Ani airporta velo chai cost, Rs. 150! Robbery, hanv tumka sangtam!
normalised: Magir airport-cho puro anubhav. Security linio sadhyaa lamb zaatay, khas korun Diwali vo gim'ache sutti asatana. Hanv power bank gheun vetalo (vis hazar m-A-h), aani mhaka thamboylo – dislem, tem tumchea haatachea saamaanant zaunk zai. Sadhyaa khann! Aani airport-cher chai-k kharch, ek shambe pon'nas rupiyaa! Chorri, hanv tumkam sangtam!

unnormalised: On the plus side, anek airport-ani khoreponi sudarona zalea paillea vorsa bhitor. Delhi-nchem Terminal 3 khup swanky asa, ani thoddhe chot airport-ani jevn Guwahati-n maka facelift mella. Free Wi-Fi tempon kallji kaddpaak jiwan asa. Punn speed-ache dhorm sodanch dusre video download korunk zuzonk podtaa.
normalised: Faydeantu, zaiteo airport-chi sudharana zaun keli mhunn thoddea vorshank zaataa. Delhi-chi Terminal teen sundar zaata, aani Guwahati sarkhea komi airport-cher sudharana zaun geli. Vel maarpak free Wi-Fi jivit rakshaak zaata. Punn kitlya lokani video downlodd korpak zait zaalay tem vegaacher nirbhor zaata.

unnormalised: Ataam, flight swata. Hea vellar vostu bore dista. Maka 4 hrs delay jalea flights-chem karonn “operational reasons” asa (tem kitem-tor kitem!) Tumim gate-cher zatkanch thambta, ani dusreko charging points korunk zai. Punn tempon zalea, bore dhorten korta. Cabin crew sadharanach polik aastha, ani safety demos… bore, tumi tanka million pautin zalele distaa, sorkhem nahi?
normalised: Aataan, fllait aapnachem. Hantu vostu vhoddilzaun ghodtaa. Mhaji fllait char horas ukheer zataali karan “kaarya kaarannaam” (tem kiteak sangtaat!). Tor tumi gate-cher thambun raavtaat, charger sodhchyaak. Punn vostu vella-cher zaatana, tem sadharan thik zata. Cabin-che sevadhari sadharan narm zaataat, aani suraksha sangop…. tumi aikuun aasaat million vel, naavho?

unnormalised: Food vixim, plane food tem plane food. Hanv sadharanaach complimentary udoc gheunk sodtam ani maybe Kurkure packet ghenvche ₹30. Thoddhe airlines online pre-booking meals offer karta extra Rs. 500 va takachem, punn hanv nitya bhuk laguk poddla. Maka sodanch thambunk poddla ani destination-cher kitem-tor kitem gheunk poddla.
normalised: Jeunn vishim, pleyan jeunn mhunn jeunn zaata. Hanv sadharan free udak ghetaa aani Kurkure-chem packet ghetaa (tees rupiyaa). Thodde fllait-ache saavkaar onllain jeunn book kortaat punn paanch shambe rupiyaa zai, punn hanv kelnaa. Hanv thambunk sodhtaam aani sodhun jevtaa.

unnormalised: Landing on time? Tem sodanch gamble. Maza IndiGo flight khoreanench 15 mins mortem Mumbai-n land zale. Punn hanv dusrem flights aslem 30 mins circle kelem landing korchea poilim kiteak air traffic aslem. Sigh. Tuka sodanch nirmati nahi.
normalised: Vella-cher ravopaak? Tem sadhyaa juvaar zaata. Mhaji IndiGo fllait pondhra minute poilim Mumbai-cher ravli. Punn mhaji dusri fllait tees minute bhauntaali karan hava-pyaaryaanchi vordhol asali mhunn. Haaa. Tumkaank kennaa zaunk zata mhunn thavuk na.

unnormalised: Overall, flying Indian Airways… ek anubhav asa. Tem relatively affordable asa (dusrea desank sampoita), punn tumka potential delay, crowded airport, ani overpriced chai-k zhokunk zai. Just tumchi patience, ek bore pustok, ani maybe snacks pack kara. Ani sodanch baggage allowance check kara - tem nightmare asta extra fees check-in counter-cher mellounk (Rs. 300 per kg limit-acha voir!). Safe travels, lokanno!
normalised: Saamaanntar, Indian Airways-cher bhonvddi… ek anubhav zaata. Tem komi zaata (dusrea deshaan sarki), punn tumi zaiteo rukvottichi tayaari korpak zai, lokani bharapeo airport aani zasti chai. Dhir dhorun saamaan ghevun voch, ek bori pustak aani thodde upaa's. Aani saamaan kiteak melltta mhunn sodh – tem baraabori zaata karan rupiyaa teen shambe per killogram zasti zaata mhunn! Surakshit bhonvddi, mitraanno!
